pr_title: Cache FID to avoid multiple disk reads.

timeline.message: Cache FID to avoid multiple disk reads.

timeline.bodyText:
please add a comment here, example:
/** FID of this FirebaseInstallations instance. Cached after the first successful read from local storage. */
timeline.author: andirayo

timeline.bodyText: Do this as first line of #doGetId().
timeline.author: andirayo

timeline.bodyText:
I recommend to remove this and only set cachedFid when you successfully read from SharedPrefs.
Your solution is probably better because 1 less read of SharedPrefs, but potentially more error cases.
timeline.author: andirayo

timeline.bodyText:
I recommend making this the first line of this method.
That way, if something goes wrong somewhere we have made sure to clear the cache.
Worst case we have 1 unnecessary disk read.
timeline.author: andirayo
